channel.title: ForbesCraft 1.2.5 LagFree 24/7 Hardcore PVP Survival Economy
channel.description:
ForbesCraft, We make minecraft the way it was meant to be played. On ForbesCraft we have the most dedicated staff. On our server you can create your own team, fight for land and try to take over the world. And we even have our own teamspeak community where you can get on and chat with everybody using a mic. Also you can talk to us on our website and you can send us a message if you ever need help. You are guaranteed a response however way you try to communicate with us. We don't tolerate cheaters and if you do try to cheat you are automatically banned globally on mcbans. On ForbesCraft, we play legitly, and not with some cheap hacks. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IP: Mc.ForbesCraft.Net
Website: www.forbescraft.net
